snippet: British bank Shawbrook Group Plc said on Friday it has received an offer from private equity firms Pollen Street Capital and BC Partners to buy the lender in a deal worth 825 million pounds ($1.01 billion)....

headline.main: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional
headline.print_headline: Judge: Miami-Dade Deportation Policy Is Unconstitutional

lead_paragraph: British bank Shawbrook Group Plc said on Friday it has received an offer from private equity firms Pollen Street Capital and BC Partners to buy the lender in a deal worth 825 million pounds ($1.01 billion).
